headline: ServiceNow AI Push With Anthropic Tests Investor Appetite For Premium Valuation
summary: ServiceNow expanded its AI collaboration with Anthropic to embed Claude models across core products and workflows. The company rolled out Claude powered tools internally to more than 29,000 employees to support productivity and software development. New customer deployments with Fiserv and Panasonic Avionics extend ServiceNow's AI use into financial services and aviation operations. ServiceNow (NYSE:NOW) is leaning into applied AI at a time when its share price, at $117.01, reflects a mixed...
